name: ④打开微信位置共享、小程序及定位界面自动开关GPS
description: 打开微信位置共享、小程序及定位界面时打开GPS，返回微信聊天界面时关闭GPS，使用全局变量WEIXINGPS--酷安@幻觉
condition: if( activityResumed == true && hw.isLocationEnabled() == false && globalVarOf$WEIXINGPS.contains(componentNameAsShortString)) { ui.showShortToast("GPS打开" + (hw.enableLocation() ? "成功" : "失败")) } else if ( activityResumed == true && hw.isLocationEnabled() == true && componentNameAsShortString == "com.tencent.mm/.ui.LauncherUI") { ui.showShortToast("GPS关闭" + (hw.disableLocation() ? "成功" : "失败")) }
